com.azure.storage.file

Class FileClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.storage.file.FileClientBuilder

  • public class FileClientBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a fluent builder API to help aid the configuration and instantiation of the FileClients and FileAsyncClients, calling buildClient constructs an instance of FileClient and calling buildAsyncClient constructs an instance of FileAsyncClient.

    The client needs the endpoint of the Azure Storage File service, name of the share, and authorization credential. endpoint gives the builder the endpoint and may give the builder the FileClientBuilder.shareName(String), FileClientBuilder.filePath(String) and a SASTokenCredential that authorizes the client.

    Instantiating a synchronous File Client with SAS token

    FileClient fileClient = new FileClientBuilder()
    .endpoint("https://${accountName}.file.core.windows.net?${SASToken}")
    .shareName("myshare")
    .filePath("myfilepath")
    .buildClient();

    Instantiating an Asynchronous File Client with SAS token

    DirectoryClient directoryClient = new DirectoryClientBuilder()
    .endpoint("https://${accountName}.file.core.windows.net?${SASToken}")
    .shareName("myshare")
    .directoryPath("mydirectory")
    .buildClient();

    If the endpoint doesn't contain the query parameters to construct a SASTokenCredential they may be set using credential.

    FileClient fileClient = new FileClientBuilder()
    .endpoint("https://${accountName}.file.core.windows.net")
    .credential(SASTokenCredential.fromQuery("${SASTokenQueryParams}"))
    .shareName("myshare")
    .filePath("myfilepath")
    .buildClient();

    FileAsyncClient fileAsyncClient = new FileClientBuilder()
    .endpoint("https://{accountName}.file.core.windows.net")
    .credential(SASTokenCredential.fromQuery("${SASTokenQueryParams}"))
    .shareName("myshare")
    .filePath("myfilepath")
    .buildAsyncClient();

    Another way to authenticate the client is using a SharedKeyCredential. To create a SharedKeyCredential a connection string from the Storage File service must be used. Set the SharedKeyCredential with connectionString. If the builder has both a SASTokenCredential and SharedKeyCredential the SharedKeyCredential will be preferred when authorizing requests sent to the service.

    Instantiating a synchronous File Client with connection string.

    String connectionString = "DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName={name};AccountKey={key}"
    + ";EndpointSuffix={core.windows.net}";
DirectoryClient directoryClient = new DirectoryClientBuilder()
    .connectionString(connectionString).shareName("myshare").directoryPath("mydirectory")
    .buildClient();

    Instantiating an Asynchronous File Client with connection string.

    String connectionString = "DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName={name};AccountKey={key};"
    + "EndpointSuffix={core.windows.net}";
DirectoryAsyncClient directoryAsyncClient = new DirectoryClientBuilder()
    .connectionString(connectionString).shareName("myshare").directoryPath("mydirectory")
    .buildAsyncClient();
    See Also:
    FileClient, FileAsyncClient, SASTokenCredential, SharedKeyCredential

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileClientBuilder

        public FileClientBuilder()
        Creates a builder instance that is able to configure and construct FileClients and FileAsyncClients.

    • Method Detail

      • buildAsyncClient

        public FileAsyncClient buildAsyncClient()
        Creates a FileAsyncClient based on options set in the builder. Every time buildAsyncClient() is called a new instance of FileAsyncClient is created.

        If pipeline is set, then the pipeline and endpoint are used to create the client. All other builder settings are ignored.

        Returns:
        A ShareAsyncClient with the options set from the builder.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If shareName is null or the (@code filePath) is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If neither a SharedKeyCredential or SASTokenCredential has been set.

      • buildClient

        public FileClient buildClient()
        Creates a FileClient based on options set in the builder. Every time buildClient() is called a new instance of FileClient is created.

        If pipeline is set, then the pipeline and endpoint are used to create the client. All other builder settings are ignored.

        Returns:
        A FileClient with the options set from the builder.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If endpoint, shareName or filePath is null.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If neither a SharedKeyCredential or SASTokenCredential has been set.

      • endpoint

        public FileClientBuilder endpoint(java.lang.String endpoint)
        Sets the endpoint for the Azure Storage File instance that the client will interact with.

        The first path segment, if the endpoint contains path segments, will be assumed to be the name of the share that the client will interact with. Rest of the path segments should be the path of the file. It mush end up with the file name if more segments exist.

        Query parameters of the endpoint will be parsed using SASTokenCredential#fromQuery(String) in an attempt to generate a SASTokenCredential to authenticate requests sent to the service.

        Parameters:
        endpoint - The URL of the Azure Storage File instance to send service requests to and receive responses from.
        Returns:
        the updated FileClientBuilder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If endpoint is null or is an invalid URL

      • credential

        public FileClientBuilder credential(SASTokenCredential credential)
        Sets the SASTokenCredential used to authenticate requests sent to the File service.
        Parameters:
        credential - SAS token credential generated from the Storage account that authorizes requests
        Returns:
        the updated FileClientBuilder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If credential is null.

      • credential

        public FileClientBuilder credential(SharedKeyCredential credential)
        Sets the SharedKeyCredential used to authenticate requests sent to the File service.
        Parameters:
        credential - Shared key credential generated from the Storage account that authorizes requests
        Returns:
        the updated ShareClientBuilder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If credential is null.

      • connectionString

        public FileClientBuilder connectionString(java.lang.String connectionString)
        Creates a SharedKeyCredential from the connectionString used to authenticate requests sent to the File service.
        Parameters:
        connectionString - Connection string from the Access Keys section in the Storage account
        Returns:
        the updated FileClientBuilder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If connectionString is null.

      • shareName

        public FileClientBuilder shareName(java.lang.String shareName)
        Sets the share that the constructed clients will interact with
        Parameters:
        shareName - Name of the share
        Returns:
        the updated FileClientBuilder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If shareName is null.

      • filePath

        public FileClientBuilder filePath(java.lang.String filePath)
        Sets the file that the constructed clients will interact with
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the file, mush end up with the file name.
        Returns:
        the updated FileClientBuilder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If filePath is null.

        public FileClientBuilder addPolicy(HttpPipelinePolicy pipelinePolicy)
        Adds a policy to the set of existing policies that are executed after the RetryPolicy.
        Parameters:
        pipelinePolicy - The retry policy for service requests.
        Returns:
        The updated FileClientBuilder object.
        Throws:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The updated FileClientBuilder object.

      • pipeline

        public FileClientBuilder pipeline(HttpPipeline pipeline)
        Sets the HTTP pipeline to use for the service client.

        If pipeline is set, all other settings are ignored, aside from endpoint, shareName @{link FileClientBuilder#filePath(String) filePath}, and snaphotShot when building clients.

        Parameters:
        pipeline - The HTTP pipeline to use for sending service requests and receiving responses.
        Returns:
        The updated FileClientBuilder object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If pipeline is null.

      • configuration

        public FileClientBuilder configuration(Configuration configuration)

        Parameters:
        configuration - configuration store
        Returns:
        the updated FileClientBuilder object

      • snapshot

        public FileClientBuilder snapshot(java.lang.String snapshot)
        Sets the snapshot that the constructed clients will interact with. This snapshot must be linked to the share that has been specified in the builder.
        Parameters:
        snapshot - Identifier of the snapshot
        Returns:
        the updated FileClientBuilder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If snapshot is null.
